text: 26 December 2024 : Thursday Dec 2024 : Thursday Here‚Äôs a bunch of little AI ideas I‚Äôm working on for some short films. Obviously, the tools are getting A LOT better, but not quite slick enough to make the kind of things I want to make. I can combine together 3-5 different AI programs + editors etc etc to get close. I used Sora for this, and I only get 1,000 credits with the Pro version of ChatGPT. With 1,000 credits, I could only get out about 1.5 minutes of ‚Äúinteresting‚Äù clips that didn‚Äôt look too wonky. There‚Äôs another level for $200 a month where I get 10,000 credits, so with that ratio, I‚Äôd only get 15 mins of usable video. The new Veo from Google looks amazing too‚Ä¶ looking forward to getting access to that! Anyway, as usual, just experimenting with everything and having a good time‚Ä¶ üôÇ
html:
26

December 2024 : Thursday Dec 2024 : Thursday

Here‚Äôs a bunch of little AI ideas I‚Äôm working on for some short films. Obviously, the tools are getting A LOT better, but not quite slick enough to make the kind of things I want to make. I can combine together 3-5 different AI programs + editors etc etc to get close. I used Sora for this, and I only get 1,000 credits with the Pro version of ChatGPT. With 1,000 credits, I could only get out about 1.5 minutes of ‚Äúinteresting‚Äù clips that didn‚Äôt look too wonky. There‚Äôs another level for $200 a month where I get 10,000 credits, so with that ratio, I‚Äôd only get 15 mins of usable video. The new Veo from Google looks amazing too‚Ä¶ looking forward to getting access to that! Anyway, as usual, just experimenting with everything and having a good time‚Ä¶ üôÇ
